subject: Baseball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Alex Rodriguez, recovering from hip surgery, won’t be in the opening day lineup, just as Joe D was missing in 1949 with a bone spur, and the Babe was in St. Vincent’s Hospital in 1925.
snippet: Alex Rodriguez, recovering from hip surgery, won’t be in the opening day lineup, just as Joe D was missing in 1949 with a bone spur, and the Babe was in St. Vincent’s Hospital in 1925.
